class.name: UtilityAIBTLeaf
class.brief_description: Used for conditions and actions. You should define your own [code]on_tick()[/code] method where you do your logic.
class.description: The leaf node is used for conditions and actions. You should define your own [method UtilityAIBTTaskNodes._tick] method where you do your logic. Example: [gdscript] func on_tick(blackboard: Variant, delta: float) -> Status: return Status.SUCCESS [/gdscript]
